text: E'ito adrsya sambadasamuhara antarbhukta, yito ami tomaka ahira dbaraa arahita karaicho; arau mara'iyamara tattbaradhanara dayitba sihamtara majara kone grahana karaiba tara babe yetiya sihamte sihamtara kalama niksepa karaichila tetiya tumi sihamtara ocarata upasthita nachila arau sihamte yetiya badanubada karai achila tetiya'o tumi tata upasthita nachila
